name: Bunny Mark Events
Description: Events related to the bunny zodiac mark

theScene: Vanesa pulses with a soft pink glow as she places her hands on your chest
Just relax my little snack, this wont hurt a bit ♥
Her hands trace a small arcane symbol in the air slighty above your heart before pushing it into your skin.
There, that's better ♥. It's not complete yet but it's a start. See you next time cutie ♥
As you fade away you feel a warm pulse of energy as the mark takes hold
Vanesa leans over you once again, as she begins to pulse with a soft pink energy you feel your zodiac mark begin to pulse in sync with her
Are you ready to complete the mark cutie?♥
She leans in and gives you a light kiss on the lips as her hand delicately pulls out her arcane mark from your chest, leaving it floating an inch or so above you
Ah♥ You're going to love this ♥
Her hand begins to add more intricate patterns to the floating mark, feeling your mind begin to drift to thoughts of the voluptuous bunny riding you
With the mark complete Vanesa lightly pushes it back into your chest, the feeling of her hands caressing your skin iliciting a soft moan from you
All done ♥. You'll be a perfect meal for me next time ♥
As you fade away, a smile forms on your face as you think of being her personal dish to eat ♥
As you fade away, Vanesa's voice echoes through the air
You were delicious, make sure to come back with plenty for me to eat ♥
